text: WAT is the sixth studio album by Slovenian music group Laibach, released September 8, 2003. The CD included a bonus video of "Tanz mit Laibach" and the vinyl LP and promo CD "Reject or Breed". The album title is an acronym for "We Are Time" as the title track reveals. "The point of WAT is not what Laibach is, or what it wants, but what you are and where you stand". ==CD track listing== # "B Mashina" performed by Laibach / Tomi Meglič – 3:50 (83 BPM) # "Tanz mit Laibach" (Laibach/Meglič/Turk/Umek) – 4:19 (126 BPM) # "Du bist unser" (Laibach/Mlakar/Umek) – 5:38 (125 BPM) # "Achtung!" (Laibach/Mlakar/Turk) – 4:06 # "Ende" (Laibach/Turk/Umek) – 3:45 # "Reject or Breed" (Laibach/Turk) – 4:07 # "Satanic Versus" (Laibach/Umek) – 4:52 C: # "Now You Will Pay" (Laibach/Turk) – 6:07 # "Hell: Symmetry" (Laibach/Turk) – 5:02 # "Das Spiel ist aus" (Laibach/Turk) – 4:21 D: # "The Great Divide" (Laibach/Turk) – 5:11 # "WAT" (Avsenik/Laibach/Turk/Umek) – 5:33 # "Anti-Semitism" (DJ Bizzy/DJ Dojaja/Laibach/Temponauta) – 5:39 ==References== Category:Laibach (band) albums Category:2003 albums Category:Mute Records albums
